amendment.description: Amendment requires that amounts remaining in Members' representational allowances be used for deficit reduction or to reduce the Federal debt.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 and printed in H.Rept. 106-165 to require the amounts remaining in Members' representational allowances to be used for deficit reduction or to reduce the Federal debt.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Camp amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
